es.eurohelp.lod.aldapa.storage

Interface FunctionalRDFStore

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FunctionalSPARQLStore
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FunctionalDBRDFStore

    public interface FunctionalRDFStore
extends FunctionalSPARQLStore
    An RDF store is anything that stores RDF: Triple Store, memory store, NoSQL DB, file store, etc.
    Author:
    Mikel Egana Aranguren, Eurohelp S.L.
